Title: Directs the public service commission to prohibit the attachment of wireless equipment or any other like attachments to existing utility poles in certain circumstances
Summary: Directs the public service commission to prohibit the attachment of wireless equipment or any other like attachments to existing utility poles in certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง119-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to prohibiting the attachment of wireless equipment and other like attachments to existing utility poles in certain circumstances
